question: What is the main aim of National Mission for sustainable agriculture?
option1: Promoting Sustainable Agriculture through climate change adaptation measures
option2: Promoting Sustainable Agriculture through HYV variety seeds
option3: Promoting Sustainable Agriculture through increasing productivity of crops
option4: Promoting Sustainable Agriculture through increased irrigation
answer: Promoting Sustainable Agriculture through climate change adaptation measures
explanation: National Mission for sustainable agriculture is one of the eight Missions under the National Action Plan on Climate Change (NAPCC). It aims at promoting Sustainable Agriculture through climate change adaptation measures. It enhances agriculture productivity especially in rainfed areas focusing on integrated farming, soil health management, and synergizing resource conservation.
